channel.title: Ip on 508?
channel.description: i have my no-ip ready for it, but i dont know were to change the ip on the source, not the client, and if i google search it, its only how to change it on the client, i searched engine.java and server.java, any idea how to change it?

item.title: Ip on 508?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

drubrkletern:

ok, but i dont get how it automatically takes that ip for it :o

for 508 client go down to very bottom of client.java u should see a string wit ip

similiar to this(mine renamed)

Class75_Sub2.isSafeMode = false; [b]Class68_Sub9.server = "127.0.0.1";[/b] Class26.aRSString_521 = Class68_Sub28_Sub2.aRSString_4556; Class68_Sub13_Sub20.anInt3780 = 0; client var_client = new client(); CustomSprites.loadCustomSprites(var_client); var_client.startClient(765, 503, 109, 27, "runescape", 508, 32 - -Class13_Sub4.gameState); Class108.gameWindow.setLocation(40, 40); } catch (Exception exception) { Class71.handleException(null, exception, 38); } anInt2378++; }
